channel.title: Posts on Notre-Dame de Paris
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Notre-Dame de Paris

item.title: Build Hugo
item.description: 我是在ubuntu上搭建hugo博客的 1.首先，安装hugo。 sudo apt install hugo hugo new site newblog cd newblog git submodule add https://github.com/budparr/gohugo-theme-ananke.git themes/ananke echo 'theme = "ananke"' >> config.toml # 或者，编辑config.toml，在最后加入 theme = "ananke" hugo new posts/first-post.md hugo server -D hugo 2.将hugo部署到github pages git config --global user.name "yourname" git config --global user.email "youremail" git config user.name git config user.email ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail" ssh-keygen -t rsa -C "youremail" 首先，创建两个仓库，分别名为your-blog和username.
